title: 关于官方服的问题
txt_content:
想开个官方服，但是点了jar文件后出现错误，日志文件如下，求大神帮忙解决

[20:50:23] [Server Shutdown Thread/INFO]: Stopping server[20:50:23] [Server thread/INFO]: Stopping server[20:50:23] [Server thread/INFO]: You need to agree to the EULA in order to run the server. Go to eula.txt for more info（求翻译）.[20:50:23] [Server thread/INFO]: Loading properties at ld$2.run(SourceFile:95) [minecraft_server.1.10.2.jar:?] at java.io.BufferedReader.readLine(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_92] at java.io.BufferedReader.readLine(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_92] at java.io.BufferedReader.fill(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_92] at java.io.InputStreamReader.read(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_92] at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.read(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_92] at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.implRead(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_92] at sun.nio.cs.StreamDecoder.readBytes(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_92] at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_92] at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read1(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_92] at java.io.FileInputStream.read(Unknown Source) ~[?:1.8.0_92] at java.io.FileInputStream.readBytes(Native Method) ~[?:1.8.0_92]java.io.IOException: 句柄无效。[20:50:23] [Server console handler/ERROR]: Exception handling console input[20:50:23] [Server thread/INFO]: Starting minecraft server version 1.10.2

replies.author: Joket_abc
replies.txt_content: 把生成的eula.txt中的false改为true开服即可

小小马 发表于 2016-7-4 20:52
把生成的eula.txt中的false改为true开服即可
哇塞，真行哎，谢谢大神
